movies.title: Joelma 23º Andar
movies.plot: Young Lucimar and her brother Alfredo work in the same building, in São Paulo, known as Joelma. She dies in the 1974 fire that destroyed the building, but Alfredo survives. Lucimar's mother, Dona Lucinda, gets very depressed after her daughter's death and, following some friends' indication, contacts famous medium Chico Xavier, looking for some comfort and a message from the dead.
movies.simplePlot: The after-life journey of a young woman, the youngest in her spiritualist family, after she perishes in the disastrous Joelma building fire in 1974.

biography.placeOfBirth: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
biography.bio: Beth Goulart was born on January 25, 1961 in Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil as Elizabeth Miessa. She is an actress, known for The Clone (2001), Tropical Paradise (2007) and Três Irmãs (2008).
biography.name: Beth Goulart

biography.bio: Liana Duval was born on June 6, 1927 in São Paulo, Brazil as Maria de Lourdes Vasconcelos Antunes. She was an actress, known for Act of Violence (1980), Joelma 23º Andar (1980) and Anjo Loiro (1973). She died on March 23, 2011 in Carmo da Cachoeira, Minas Gerais, Brazil.
biography.name: Liana Duval

biography.bio: Carlos Marques is an actor, known for Joelma 23º Andar (1980), Les mille et une farces de Pif et Hercule (1993) and A Floresta Feliz (2000).
biography.name: Carlos Marques

biography.bio: Márcia Fraga was born on February 19, 1958 in São Paulo, São Paulo, Brazil. She is an actress, known for A Prisão (1980), The Empire of Desire (1981) and Amazon Jail (1982).
biography.name: Márcia Fraga

biography.bio: Maria Ferreira is an actress, known for Joelma 23º Andar (1980), La nave de los locos (1995) and Asa Branca - Um Sonho Brasileiro (1980).

biography.bio: Alvamar Taddei was born in May 1960 in Jacarezinho, Paraná, Brazil. She is an actress, known for Filme Demência (1986), Amor, Palavra Prostituta (1982) and The Chick's Ability (1984).
biography.name: Alvamar Taddei

biography.bio: Marly de Fátima was born on January 14, 1946 in Nova Friburgo, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. She is an actress, known for Roberto Carlos e o Diamante Cor-de-Rosa (1968), A Difícil Vida Fácil (1972) and O Homem da Cabeça de Ouro (1975).
